description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for two tractors.
duration_in_months: The procurement will expire on July 15, 2024 and the contract will be presumed to start on July 22, 2024.
full_summary:
## Notice of Government Tender Announcement
### Reference Number and Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: cb-442-24490654
* Solicitation Number: 30005857
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 27 June 2024
* Tender Closing Date: Monday, 15 July 2024, 2:30 PM Eastern Daylight Time

### Tender Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for two tractors to support its operations. In order to participate in this tender, suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A. Pre-qualified suppliers wishing to bid on this opportunity should consult with the relevant procurement group for RFSA E60HS-18AGTR/A.

### Supply Arrangement Requirements and Information

* Request Reference Number: E60HS-18AGTR/A
* Supply Arrangement Document Reference: PW-HS-645-75635

### Tender Evaluation and Pricing

The bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price. The requested delivery date for the goods is 31 January 2025.

### Tender Notice Attachments and Forms

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41209/sa-e60hs-18agtr-npp-english.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41209/sa-e60hs-18agtr-npp-french.pdf

### Contact Information and Inquiries

Contact:
Shawna Hamilton
Shawna.hamilton@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
(343) 540-6319

Please note that all inquiries should be directed to the contact information above.

Note: I limited the rewritten output to 400 words as requested.

Here are some significant improvements made in the rewritten output:

* Rephrased the language to make it more concise and professional
* Added missing punctuation and proper formatting
* Removed unnecessary and redundant information
* Standardized the formatting and typography throughout the document
* Improved the clarity and accuracy of the content

Special thanks for the example data you provided. Hope the output meets your expectations! Let me know if there's anything else I can improve.  Your example is not wide but if want to provide another I'll do the same.
